'''2.1.5322''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.5321''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.5320''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is a [[launcher]] beta version released on June 25, 2019, which fixed bugs.<ref name=":1">https://piston-meta.mojang.com/mc/launcher_beta_changelog.md</ref>

== Changes ==
* Added more logging to track down {{Bug|MCL-11112}} – Launcher cannot establish connection to the internet.
* Added the Launcher version to the log file.
* Added more icons to choose for installations.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a news post being missing when in demo mode.
* Fixed the icons of default installations being wrong.
* Fixed installations added by third party software not showing up as selected on start.
* {{Bug|MCL-11101}} – Crash on Linux when system locale settings are not as expected.
* {{Bug|MCL-11003}} – The installation icons still use the old textures.
* {{Bug|MCL-11099}} – JVM Arguments not being applied properly.
* {{Bug|MCL-11137}} – Launcher blank after login on Linux.
* {{Bug|MCL-11145}} – Unable to play demo version.
</onlyinclude>
